title: Maranjita Pirinjita Lyrics Trisha Illana Nayanthara
stanzas:
Maranthuta Pirinjita Song Lyrics From Trisha Illana Nayanthara
#GVPrakashKumar

Poyinnu sonniye
adhu ennaachu
kaathula karanjadhaa
adi un pechu
kattingu bodhaya
en kadhal
thelinju pochu..

kalindinu poraddhukkaa
enna kadhalicha
nambunen, manasathaan
nee nogadicha
sincere lovea thaan
nee simple-a saavadicha

maranjita pirinjita
nee sollaama
thavikkuren kalanguren
nee illaama
naragatha kaattura
enkooda nee seraama.
